entities.description: Indicates if the respondent ever used a needle to inject IMF (illicit drugs).
Indicates if the respondent ever used a needle to inject drugs.
Indicates if the respondent used a needle to inject drugs in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent used non-prescription fentanyl products including IMF in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent used non-prescription opioids including IMF in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent used non-prescription opioids including IMF in the past month.
Indicates if the respondent ever used an illicit drug or IMF or other such substances.
Indicates if the respondent used an illicit drug or IMF or other such substances in the past year.

relationships.description: Indicates the history of needle use for IMF by the respondent.
Indicates the history of any needle use for injecting drugs by the respondent.
Indicates the history of past year needle use for injecting drugs by the respondent.
Indicates the use of fentanyl products including IMF in the past year by the respondent.
Indicates the use of non-prescription opioids including IMF in the past year by the respondent.
Indicates the use of non-prescription opioids including IMF in the past month by the respondent.
Indicates the history of illicit drug or IMF or other such substances use by the respondent.
Indicates the use of illicit drug or IMF or other such substances in the past year by the respondent.
